item.title: A Kalshi marked experienced a liquidity panic; whale gamblers got bailed out — 41 replies
item.description:
A Kalshi marked experienced a liquidity panic; whale gamblers got bailed out

Replies: 41 | Images: 4 | ~54.4 replies/hr

Holy shit! $3.6 million market decided despite clear rules and video evidence! It was a Mentions market based on the recent Bernie Sanders rally in Greensboro (on 2/12). Trading was ramping up before the event, with all of the typical Bernie triggers at 90% (Trump, socialism, immigration, corruption, billionaire, etc.). Pretty typical, low liquidity mentions market, maybe $400k. In the blink of an eye, it shoots ip to $1.5 million, as Kalshi began advertising it in their front page. I heard t…

item.title: Understand the funeral industry. Prevent yourself from being ripped off. — 120 replies
item.description:
Understand the funeral industry. Prevent yourself from being ripped off.

Replies: 120 | Images: 18 | ~42.5 replies/hr

Basically, people are f'd up when going through grief, and in the West, especially for christians or traditiinalists, the traditional funeral service at a venue seems to be an iconic image. Funeral Homes can be owned by corporations or private equity, who can be greedy people. They know the bereaved are in a lost and confused state of mind, and may not do research, "shop around" (seen as rude..), or understand the value for what they get. Urns, Caskets, cremations, and services can be marked…
